scripts.predev: docker info > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo '⚠️  Docker is not running. Please start Docker or Colima first.' && exit 1)
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "db,backend,frontend" -c "blue,yellow,green" "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
